1.content:
A helicopter flew across the sky, carrying a young, nubile woman who went by the name of Rinslet Walker, a twenty-one year old thief hired by the government. She was wearing a promiscuous outfit consisting a dark-red corset that covers as much as a bra would, a pair of tight-fitting black mini-skirt that covers a few inches of her thighs with a grey belt wrapped around her waist, and a pair of black boots. She wore a red heart-shaped necklace, a bracelet on her left wrist, and kept an expensive purse with an exotic fur-coat design. Short violet-hair, green eyes, smooth light-tan skin, she was quite a looker. Her arms, midriff, and thighs were bare.

In her purse, she possessed a handheld gun, a set of lockpicks, a flashlight, a small mirror mounted on a metal handle, and a pocket knife.

For tonight's mission, she was been escorted towards...

Rinslet's Stat ▼


Health: 100/100, she is in her peak condition.

Time: Day 0, 6:25 PM

Clothes: Rinslet is wearing a dark-red midriff-revealing corset, a pair of tight-fitting black mini-skirt, a grey belt, and a pair of black boots. She wore a red heart-shaped necklace and a bracelet on her left wrist.

Equipment: Purse - containing a handheld gun with 10 bullets, a set of lockpicks, a flashlight, a small mirror mounted on a metal handle, and a pocket knife.

Bio: https://static.f-list.net/images/charinl...
1.title: Rinslet Walker

info.brief_description: Rinslet Walker is a thief-for-hire who thrives in danger.
info.pretty_title: The Erotic Adventures of Rinslet Walker
